[File: source_map.rs] [Aptos Integration] [Gas Accounting] Is source map processing included in gas costs, or can attackers spam complex source maps without cost? (Medium)
[File: source_map.rs] [Aptos Integration] [State Storage] Are source maps stored on-chain in AptosDB, and if so, can large source maps cause state bloat attacks? (High)
[File: source_map.rs] [Edge Case] [Empty Functions] How are source maps handled for empty functions (no code), and can this cause index-out-of-bounds when accessing code_map[0]? (Medium)
[File: source_map.rs] [Edge Case] [Zero Parameters] Functions with zero parameters - does get_parameter_or_local_name() handle idx=0 correctly when parameters is empty? (Low)
[File: source_map.rs] [Edge Case] [Max Type Parameters] What happens when type_parameters.len() approaches usize::MAX - can this cause integer overflows in index arithmetic? (Medium)
[File: source_map.rs] [Edge Case] [Variant Overflow] For enum variants, can variant indices exceed u16::MAX causing wraparound when stored as VariantIndex? (Medium)
[File: source_map.rs] [Edge Case] [Module Name Edge Cases] Can module names with special characters like '.' or '/' cause issues when converted to Identifier? (Low)
[File: marking.rs] [Edge Case] [Empty Markings] When all marking vectors are empty, do consumers handle this gracefully without panicking on empty iteration? (Low)
[File: mapping.rs] [Edge Case] [View Lifetime] What happens if BinaryIndexedView becomes invalid during SourceMapping's lifetime - are there safety checks? (High)
[File: utils.rs] [Edge Case] [Empty Files] Can empty source map files (0 bytes) cause bcs::from_bytes() to panic instead of returning an error? (Low)
[File: source_map.rs] [Concurrency] [Mutable Access] If multiple threads call add_code_mapping() concurrently on the same SourceMap, can BTreeMap mutations cause data corruption? (High)
[File: source_map.rs] [Concurrency] [Iterator Invalidation] Can concurrent modifications invalidate iterators in get_code_location()'s range query causing undefined behavior? (High)
[File: marking.rs] [Concurrency] [HashMap Mutations] Are HashMap insertions in mark_code_offset() thread-safe, or can concurrent marking cause lost updates? (High)
[File: mapping.rs] [Concurrency] [Option Replacement] Can with_marks() and with_source_code() be called concurrently, and if so, can this cause torn reads of Option values? (Medium)
[File: utils.rs] [Concurrency] [File System Race] Can concurrent source_map_from_file() calls on the same file cause file system contention or corruption? (Low)
[File: source_map.rs] [Panic Safety] [Unwrap Usage] The code uses .unwrap() in Identifier::new() - can malformed module names cause panics in validators? (High)
[File: source_map.rs] [Panic Safety] [Index Unwrap] Does .get() followed by .unwrap() in various places properly handle None cases, or can missing entries cause panics? (High)
[File: source_map.rs] [Panic Safety] [Integer Cast] Are all 'as TableIndex' and 'as CodeOffset' casts checked to prevent truncation for large values? (Medium)
[File: marking.rs] [Panic Safety] [Assert Macro] The assert! in add_nop_mapping() can panic - is this acceptable in production, or should it return Result? (High)
[File: utils.rs] [Error Handling] [IO Errors] Does source_map_from_file() properly differentiate between file-not-found, permission-denied, and corruption errors? (Low)
[File: source_map.rs] [Type Safety] [Index Types] Can FunctionDefinitionIndex be confused with StructDefinitionIndex due to both wrapping TableIndex internally? (High)
[File: source_map.rs] [Type Safety] [Phantom Types] Would phantom type parameters improve safety by preventing index type confusion at compile time? (Medium)
[File: source_map.rs] [Type Safety] [Newtype Pattern] Are CodeOffset, MemberCount, and LocalIndex distinct enough types to prevent arithmetic between incompatible indices? (Medium)
[File: marking.rs] [Type Safety] [Index Consistency] When marking code offsets, is type safety enforced to prevent marking with wrong index types? (Medium)
[File: source_map.rs] [Compatibility] [Format Evolution] If SourceMap struct fields are added/removed, will existing serialized source maps fail to deserialize safely? (High)
